name: Zombie Invaders (Z Outbreak)
description:
Zombie Invaders is the first arcade mode game from Z Outbreak. Survive waves of the undead and defend your camp to generate the most points. YOUR GROUP DEPENDS ON YOU! Try the first official demo.

Official Web: https://zoutbreak.com/

Discord: https://discord.com/invite/K5aZUBQYCh

Telegram: https://t.me/ZOutbreakOficial

Twitter: https://twitter.com/ZOutbreak_nft
